languages.text: {n}Вспыхнув, юноша кривится и невразумительно мычит:{/n} "Почтенный Махарий... не позволил... но я хотел... не допустил к битве..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Вспыхнув, юноша кривится и невразумительно мычит:{/n} "Почтенный Махариус... не позволил... но я хотел... не допустил к битве..."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honourable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."
languages.original_text: {n}Вспыхнув, юноша кривится и невразумительно мычит:{/n} "Почтенный Махарий... не позволил... но я хотел... не допустил к битве..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honorable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."

{n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honourable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは恥ずかしさで赤くなり、ボソボソと意味不明につぶやく。{/n}「栄誉あるマカリアの…禁止した…しかし私は…戦闘には出させてもらえず…」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honourable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは恥ずかしさで赤くなり、ボソボソと意味不明につぶやく。{/n}「栄誉あるマカリアの…禁止した…しかし私は…戦闘には出させてもらえず…」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克面红耳赤，语无伦次地喃喃自语道。{/n}“尊敬的马卡里乌斯……不允许我……可我真的很想……上战场……”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honourable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克面红耳赤，语无伦次地喃喃自语道。{/n}“尊敬的马卡里乌斯……不允许我……可我真的很想……上战场……”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback se sonroja y empieza a farfullar:{/n} «El honorable Macharius... me prohibió... yo quería... no me dejó ir a luchar...».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honourable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback se sonroja y empieza a farfullar:{/n} «El honorable Macharius... me prohibió... yo quería... no me dejó ir a luchar...».

languages.text: {n}Sauerback rougit jusqu'aux oreilles en marmonnant une réponse incohérente :{/n} « L'honorable Macharius... interdit... mais je voulais... ne m'a pas laissé aller au combat... »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honourable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback rougit jusqu'aux oreilles en marmonnant une réponse incohérente :{/n} « L'honorable Macharius... interdit... mais je voulais... ne m'a pas laissé aller au combat... »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback errötet und murmelt unzusammenhängend:{/n} "Der ehrenwerte Macharius ... verboten ... aber ich wollte ... durfte nicht in die Schlacht ziehen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honourable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback errötet und murmelt unzusammenhängend:{/n} "Der ehrenwerte Macharius ... verboten ... aber ich wollte ... durfte nicht in die Schlacht ziehen ..."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback'in yüzü kızarıyor, abuk sabuk bir şeyler geveliyor.{/n} "Muhterem Macharius... Olmaz dedi... Oysa ben çok istiyordum... Savaşmama izin vermedi..."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback flushes and mumbles incoherently,{/n} "The honourable Macharius... forbade... but I wanted... did not let me go to battle..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback'in yüzü kızarıyor, abuk sabuk bir şeyler geveliyor.{/n} "Muhterem Macharius... Olmaz dedi... Oysa ben çok isterdim... Savaşmama izin vermedi..."
